name: untitled game for mini travel
description:
2D platformer with an idea - a lot of things require physical endurance.
since the main character lacks animation and physical training, he's weak.
Realy wanted to make more proper content with levels and storywise. But hey! This is only a jam version. looking forward to give developing this a second weekend.

Made for MiniJam 43 Travel
left/right - move
up - interact

down - rest

F - to pay respects and also jump

G - move a bit faster

down while in air - land faster
